meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rene Cardenas Susan Bowyer Richard Block Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6388.

td.p: Rene Cardenas, a business process analyst from San Jose, California
Susan Bowyer, a consultant originally from Ripley, West Virginia
Richard Block, an editor and writer from Diamond Bar, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,001)

tr.td: OED TOP SOURCES
(Alex: The Oxford English Dictionary.)
"AA", "BB" OR "CC"
(Alex: We're not talking about batteries.)
SCENTSATIONAL!
ALFRED
LORD
TENNESSEAN

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The OED\'s most-used source is the Times of this capital city')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The OED's most-used source is the Times of this capital city

Rene

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Richard
Susan
Rene
ALFRED, LORD TENNYSON
HERE'S WHAT'S HAPPENING AT 11
THE WORLD SCIENCE FESTIVAL
(Alex: ...which opens today in New York.)
A REAL COMEDIAN
ANAGRAMS
CROSS WORLD CLUES "P"
